name: A Bone To Pick (Skirner)
description:
As a part of a school project we created this little game during November and December of 2022. You play as a fallen king that has been given a second chance by a novice necromancer. Throw your arm, jump on it, recall it and throw it again to parkour your way through the graveyard, the castle and the dungeon while also avoiding obstacles and opening doors to reach your sworn nemesis!

Made by student developers 2022-2023 at Högskolan i Skövde: Anton Andersson, Erik Evsjö, Filippa Norberg, Tomas Fiala, Emmy Hagberg
